text: Hi All, just letting you know that Betfair will be attending ICE25 (Barcelona) next week, as part of the Flutter contingent. Anyone that will be in attendance the first 2 days (20th/21st Jan) and would like to meet, feel free to drop me a DM and we can try to have someone schedule a meet with you.
